Key Arguments: The proposed legislation is against freedom and could suppress the truth.
There are claims about climate change and COVID-19 vaccines that the author believes are true but could be labeled as misinformation under the new powers.
The legislation could lead to untrained individuals making decisions about what constitutes misinformation, which is dangerous.
Main Themes: Concerns about suppression of alternative scientific views
Notable Quotes: The spirit behind this move is against freedom
If that scientific fact is characterised as 'misinformation', then we will be destroyed by the lie.
We are throwing the baby out with the bath water if we set up untrained individuals who are required to arbitrate on the basis of whether such information toes the party line.
